reviews.review: FUN FUNNY AND I I LIKE HAVING FUN,  10 fingers out of ten
Insane co-op game BIG THUMBS UP
fun as hell, great mechanics, great story
场景设计好酷啊，这玩意是艺术
Great story and an amazing continuance to the first episode of this series.

It's Portal 2, what's there to say? One of the best games there is. It became a little repetitive to me after a while, specially while playing it a second time (even though the first was long long ago). Wish it had an automatic save at the start of each level that didn't get deleted when you reach the next one, so one could go back and fulfill all achievements more easily, but other than that, it's mostly great. I still have to play the co-op missions, and I'm looking forward to it.
Very Good Game better than portal 1 and Since valve is make games again I would love to see a new game.

I loves playing this game. One of my favorite game genres are puzzle games. This game was kinda short, about 3-5 hours(for me at least because I do a lot of puzzle games and am pretty good at them) but it is still fun to replay. I really recommend this game to anyone who likes puzzle games.
Me encantó. Los puzzles son bastante retadores.
Excellent single player and multiplayer experience! Smooth controls and game play that presents a just-right challenge.  The writing is on point and pretty funny at times.
what can I say that hasn't been said

i have watched a play through of portal 1 and it looked amazing so i decided to buy portal 2 as my first portal game, i absolutely loved it, the story is great the game-play is amazing and you can run it on a shitty laptop i would recommend this to anyone.
A fun puzzle based game with great humor. I would recommend this to anyone who asks.
this game is one of the best games ive played, a vr portal would be cool (or at least another portal game in general)
Tied with Minecraft as best game ever made.
Esta Muy Bueno Que Queres Qur Te Diga , Me Encanto

Outstanding game! I first played this on xbox while it was still new, and have loved it since. It has everything I expect from a valve game. Witty humor, great gameplay, new mechanics and characters from the first game, and a whole rant about lemons! Not to mention the hours of gameplay you get with the community maps. 10/10 would recommend to a friend.
I mean... Its Portal 2 what more do you have to know
One of, if not the best game that Valve has ever released. A true game of the decade.

Einer der besten Spiele überhaupt!! Natürlich sollte man schon Portal 1 gespielt haben, bevor man mit Portal 2 anfängt. Bevor ich irgendetwas spoiler (: einfach mal selbst ausprobieren! Es Lohnt sich :]

Это одна из лучших игр, в которые я играл. Это легендарная игра. Если ваш друг говорит что портал, либо портал 2 говно, то pizdanite emu po ebalu, и перестаньте с ним дружить. Онлайн в этой игре не так важен, но если есть друг, то проходите совместную кампанию (часов 7 игры, если вы тупой). В заключении повоторюсь, одна из лучших игр, в которые я играл
One of the all time classics. The gameplay holds up over time and the jokes are on point.
This game is a classic and is my favourite game, if you haven't played this, you have to. It's that good.
great game to play alone or with friends!
iTS A FUN LOGIC BASED GAME
Fantastic follow up to the fists game portal 2 continues with a fantastic story and challenging puzzle solving challenges. The addition of player created maps is just the icing on the cake.
Good Game generally lovely graphics even tho this game is old. the puzzles are really difficult but worth to figure out. It does help your brain to get a little step up

Truly a game ahead of its time. Easily aligns with today´s game standards in terms of gameplay and even graphics to some extent. After trying it out for about one hour I am already in love with the idea and its execution, though I am yet to see all that this game has to offer. Shame that I got to try it for the first time just now, is all I can say.
amazing game even after all this time
Для меня проходить игру было  настоящим мучением, но удовольствие испытываемое в процессе и особенно в финале сравнимо с хорошим спектаклем, в котором ты играешь главную роль.
iv playd this for years and i stil love it today
Like the game, dont like the portal aspect tho, take those away and it will be perfect
The game has stunning visuals and amazing story-telling
Doskonała, kultowa, klimat nie do podrobienia. Gram w nią już 3 raz, robiąc sobie roczne przerwy i za każdym razem czuję dreszczyk emocji. Kocham miłością platoniczną.
Excelente, a la altura o mejor que el primero
Uno dei miei giochi preferiti in assoluto, assolutamente un esperienza da provare
This is one of the best games ever made. If you dont have this game go get it!!!
Goed verhaal, sluit zeer goed aan op Portal 1. Geweldige humor!
ive played this game on pc xbox 360 and xbox one and i dont often find faults with it. there are a few levels that go on for a bit too long because they are harder than the others
One of the best games i've ever played, amazing story, soundtrack and world (Recommended to play Portal 1 first before playing through this)

Portal 2 - игра, которая даже по современным реалиям имеет красивую графику. Данная головоломка заставляет не хило пораскинуть мозгами, в противном же случае игра раскинет твои, потому что иногда просто совсем не можешь додуматься, что делать.
Однопользовательский режим имеет сюжет, хоть он и немного уходит на второй план (как мне показалось), потому что главное здесь - решать головоломки, а поскольку я тупенький и долго их решал, то потихоньку забывал сюжет, но атмосфера передана неплохо.
Многопользовательский режим - это продолжение одиночной компании, но с основным сюжетом никак не связано. Можно весело с другом провести много часов, подкалывая друг друга и проверяя свою дружбу на прочность, потому что не каждый друг простит, что ты его раздавил прессом нахрен:-)
Рекомендую
Отличная игра. Не очень сложный геймплей. Хороший кооп
very fun and hard to play

Does what i say even matter at this point lol
